story.text: Jan 3 ALL TIMES IN EDT/GMT --------------------------------------------------------- Commerce Dept. issues Construction Spending for November, 1000/1500 Treasury Dept. holds weekly sale of 4-week bills, approx. 1300/1800 Federal Open Market Committee issues minutes from its Dec. 12 meeting, 1400/1900 Federal Reserve issues weekly selected interest rates, no set time ---------------------------------------------------------- DIARY - Federal Reserve Events [FED/DIARY] U.S. Indicators [US/ECI] U.S. Treasury new issues calendar [US/C]
story.title: diary - today in washington - jan 3
